# init(_:placement:)

**Initializer**

Creates a toolbar spacer item with the specified sizing behavior and placement.

## Declaration

```swift
init(_ sizing: SpacerSizing = .flexible, placement: ToolbarItemPlacement = .automatic)
```
title: init(_:placement:)
